channel.title: Tools :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: Djazz comes with many preloaded songs, but you can also load your own songs to play and improvise on.

item.title: Making a Song File
item.description: Djazz uses a song file to play a song, whether you are plaing back scores or using live MIDI or audio.

item.title: Making a Score File
item.description: Score files contain preloaded notes, formatted so that Djazz can play them and use them to improvise.
